text: xpost from <#C02HL6Y9X>. This thing is so beautiful <http://www.omata.com/home#product>

attachments.title: We Are Building The World's First Analogue GPS Bike Computer
attachments.text: We are world-class product makers with a lifelong passion for cycling, and we believe everything about your bike should be as pure, inspiring and beautiful as the ride itself. That is why we are building the world's first analogue GPS bike computer.
attachments.fallback: Omata: We Are Building The World's First Analogue GPS Bike Computer
